column2:
"Ah, <%me>.
Thank you for coming. I don't suppose I need to
tell you why I've asked you here?"

"Forgive me. Even asking the question seems
rude. I should give you more credit."

"Now, shall we be off? I've been dying a little every
moment I stand here not indulging my curiosity."

"I'm sorry. She could have at least offered you
some basic explanation."
"So, as you've likely guessed, this is another survey of the dragorii."

"Though I fear she has other intentions. Prepare
yourself, as we may be facing another one of her
wild adventures."

"If the necessity arises, we may have to drag
her away by force."

"Let's pray, for everyone's sake, that it doesn't
come to that. "

"Listen, <%me>.
I need to ask you to destroy the D-arkers as
I indicate."

"I have a hunch... Well, my hypothesis is far from
fully formed, but let's just say I'll rest easier if we
get to the D-arkers before the dragorii do."

"But, ultimately, I defer to you. Combat is a mercurial
thing. Judge the situation and respond as you will."

"<%me>くん
よく来てくれたね、待ってたよ。
目的は言わずともわかるだろう？"

"ああいや、失礼。
キミは私が見込んだアークスだ
この質問自体が無礼にあたるな。"

"さあ、行こうではないか諸君。
こうしている間も、私の知的探求心が
うずいて止まらないのだよ。"

"すみません……
ロクな説明もなしで。"

"まあ、ハイ、いつも通り
龍族についての調査なのですが……"

"先生は別の事も考えてるみたいで
正直、前みたいな暴走が怖いです。"

"いざとなったら引っ張ってでも
連れて帰りましょう。"

"それじゃ、今日は……
いえ、今日もよろしくお願いします。"

"<%me>くん。
一つ進言なんだが、私の指示に従って
ダーカーを殲滅していってくれないか。"

"データ……というには曖昧だが
少しばかり気になっててね。
なるだけ、我々の手で倒しておきたい。"

"まあ、戦場において状況は常に変わる。
最終的な判断はキミに任せるよ。"
"The Cauldron"
"Planet Amduskia"
"Aki has joined the party."
"Volcano Cave"
"惑星アムドゥスキア　火山洞窟"
"アキがパーティーに参加しました。"
